note: Retired regional transportation planner living in the heart of the San Francisco Bay Area. I’m all into progressive politics, local food, wine, beer, spirits, baseball, world travel, Road Scholar trips, e-biking, acoustic biking, transportation history, atlases, reading, jazz. I blog/post about my “data hobby”: data from the US Census, electoral data, local data, commuting, transportation trends. Joined 06-Nov-22
